content.text: Elks are very interesting animals. A lot of people donâ€™t know it, but elks are actually a type of deer and there is another word to refer to them which is moose. Female elks are called cows and male elks are called bulls. Elks can be very big animals, they can measure up to 1.5 meters and weigh up to 275 kilos. Baby elks can move much for 15 days after they are born so the cows do their best efforts to make sure they are hidden so no predators can see them.

content.name: I89F

content.text: One of the most interesting and cute animals in the world is the Axolotl. Axolotls are amphibians, which means they can actually breathe with their gills and also with their lungs.Axolotls are very small. They usually are somewhere between 20 and 25 centimeters long. Axolotls can only be found in the Xochimilco lake in Mexico and they are currently endangered.
content.name: 3KeL

content.text: It is estimated that only about 1000 exist in the wild. They can come in a variety of colors. You can see some black ones, yellow ones and even some adorable pink ones. Despite their adorable looks, Axolotls are actually carnivores and will even resort to cannibalism. This is because they eat everything in their sight. As long as it fits in its mouth they will eat it.
content.name: MNDN

content.text: Moles are little dark-furred mammals. This little fellow despite popular belief is not blind, just has really poor vision. Unlike the Axolotl, moles can be found in a very wide range of places around the world. These little guys live almost exclusively on insects which they get from digging around all the time to build their homes. Moles are not much of a threat to humans, but they are deadly to bugs, some moles are even poisonous.
content.name: jMeZ

content.class: bg-sky-900 mask mask-squircle p-2 flex justify-center

content.text: They have poison in their saliva which paralyzes worms and other insects before being eaten.
